title: Fragment, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: discontinuous supplementary wefts floating from face to face in a 3/1 twill foundation
description: Two alternating floral vine pattern stripes, three-quarters of an inch wide, one gold and the other silver on a red-purple background.
